QuestData.Title: Prison of the Forgotten
QuestData.Description:
I discovered an interesting item off the Warden you killed in the tower.
Best not to ask how I know what you do and where you do it within the tower. Let's just say, I have my ways.
But this key could lead to something interesting within Torghast. Or something horrible. Most likely horrible.
You ought to explore a bit and see what it unlocks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Figure out where to use the Key of the Forgotten.
